column4: Hello, just a quick question, when I install ubuntu, for some reason I can't bump my rez any higher than 640x480...any idea why? I could before...just with this install it won't allow it. :(
irssi is balls, anyone directing someone to use irssi should be shot.
Well I can see this channel is like tits on a boar, won't get no help here....
irssi is great when run on a 24/7 machine in screen
